data.quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
data.author: Aristotle

data.quote: Get up an hour earlier every day to work on your dreams; success will find you before you know it.
data.author: Han Yang Lim

data.quote: Some people want it to happen, some wish it would happen, others make it happen.
data.author: Michael Jordan

data.quote: Great things are done by a series of small things brought together
data.author: Vincent Van Gogh

data.quote: Very often, a change of self is needed more than a change of scene.
data.author: A.C. Benson

data.quote: Leaders can let you fail and yet not let you be a failure.
data.author: Stanley McChrystal

data.quote: The hard days are what make you stronger.
data.author: Aly Raisman

data.quote: If you believe it'll work out, you'll see opportunities. If you don't believe it'll work out, you'll see obstacles.
data.author: Wayne Dyer

data.quote: Work hard in silence, let your success be the noise.
data.author: Frank Ocean

data.quote: In a gentle way, you can shake the world.
data.author: Mahatma Gandhi

data.quote: The only difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra.
data.author: Jimmy Johnson
